DarkMouse::

After travelling for a long time, for a few weeks by now, she came 
across what her scanners showed was a high concentration of maximals 
in one location.  She sighed. "Geeez, this just isn't my lifetime. 
First I get stuck with this strange maximal who has been right on my 
tail since I left Galvatron's ship. And now I appear to be getting 
closer to a whole congregation of them. Why me?" as she sighed and 
looked up towards the sky. Her maximal signal was stronger than her 
predacon signal. But she was still unaware of the chip inside that 
was transmitting the strong maximal signature.  She was on the verge 
of giving herself up.  She turned and started to walk directly 
towards the maximal city. Perhaps she might find some answers. 
She did keep an optical out, but for the most part, she was tired, 
worn out from trying to outrun this maximal whom she thought was 
behind her when it was the chip inside her.  She stopped about a half 
a mile from the city and gave one last look up towards the sky. She 
raised her hands up to her chest as she talked,"Oh Matrix. Please, 
tell me what purpose you had intended for me. Why bring me back to 
end up like this? Run down by one bot. Chased right into the clutches 
of those whom would see me turned to scrap. Why give me the gifts you 
did and then just take them away like this? I just don't get it." she 
said as her shoulders slumped forward.  She hung her head and dragged 
her tail in the dirt beihnd her as she walked towards the maximal 
city. Little did she know the maximal chip inside her totally covered 
her predacon signal. What more, her old predacon symbol had worn off.
